com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.compute.models

Class VirtualMachineDataDiskUpdateParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.compute.models.VirtualMachineDataDiskUpdateParameters

  • public class VirtualMachineDataDiskUpdateParameters
extends Object
    Parameters supplied to the Update Virtual Machine Data Disk operation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VirtualMachineDataDiskUpdateParameters

        public VirtualMachineDataDiskUpdateParameters()
        Initializes a new instance of the VirtualMachineDataDiskUpdateParameters class.

      • VirtualMachineDataDiskUpdateParameters

        public VirtualMachineDataDiskUpdateParameters(String hostCaching,
                                              URI mediaLinkUri)
        Initializes a new instance of the VirtualMachineDataDiskUpdateParameters class with required arguments.
        Parameters:
        hostCaching - Specifies the platform caching behavior of data disk blob for read/write efficiency. The default vault is ReadOnly. Possible values are: None, ReadOnly, or ReadWrite. Warning: Setting this property impacts the consistency of the disk.
        mediaLinkUri - Specifies the location of the blob in Azure blob store where the media for the disk is located. The blob location must belong to the storage account in the subscription specified by the SubscriptionId value in the operation call. Example: http://example.blob.core.windows.net/disks/mydisk.vhd.

    • Method Detail

      • getHostCaching

        public String getHostCaching()
        Required. Specifies the platform caching behavior of data disk blob for read/write efficiency. The default vault is ReadOnly. Possible values are: None, ReadOnly, or ReadWrite. Warning: Setting this property impacts the consistency of the disk.
        Returns:
        The HostCaching value.

      • setHostCaching

        public void setHostCaching(String hostCachingValue)
        Required. Specifies the platform caching behavior of data disk blob for read/write efficiency. The default vault is ReadOnly. Possible values are: None, ReadOnly, or ReadWrite. Warning: Setting this property impacts the consistency of the disk.
        Parameters:
        hostCachingValue - The HostCaching value.

      • getLabel

        public String getLabel()
        Optional. Specifies the description of the data disk. When you attach a disk, either by directly referencing a media using the MediaLink element or specifying the target disk size, you can use the DiskLabel element to customize the name property of the target data disk.
        Returns:
        The Label value.

      • setLabel

        public void setLabel(String labelValue)
        Optional. Specifies the description of the data disk. When you attach a disk, either by directly referencing a media using the MediaLink element or specifying the target disk size, you can use the DiskLabel element to customize the name property of the target data disk.
        Parameters:
        labelValue - The Label value.

      • getLogicalDiskSizeInGB

        public int getLogicalDiskSizeInGB()
        Optional. Specifies the size, in GB, of an empty disk to be attached to the role. The disk can be created as part of disk attach or create VM role call by specifying the value for this property. Azure creates the empty disk based on size preference and attaches the newly created disk to the Role.
        Returns:
        The LogicalDiskSizeInGB value.

      • setLogicalDiskSizeInGB

        public void setLogicalDiskSizeInGB(int logicalDiskSizeInGBValue)
        Optional. Specifies the size, in GB, of an empty disk to be attached to the role. The disk can be created as part of disk attach or create VM role call by specifying the value for this property. Azure creates the empty disk based on size preference and attaches the newly created disk to the Role.
        Parameters:
        logicalDiskSizeInGBValue - The LogicalDiskSizeInGB value.

      • getLogicalUnitNumber

        public Integer getLogicalUnitNumber()
        Optional. Specifies the Logical Unit Number (LUN) for the disk. The LUN specifies the slot in which the data drive appears when mounted for usage by the virtual machine. Valid LUN values are 0 through 15.
        Returns:
        The LogicalUnitNumber value.

      • setLogicalUnitNumber

        public void setLogicalUnitNumber(Integer logicalUnitNumberValue)
        Optional. Specifies the Logical Unit Number (LUN) for the disk. The LUN specifies the slot in which the data drive appears when mounted for usage by the virtual machine. Valid LUN values are 0 through 15.
        Parameters:
        logicalUnitNumberValue - The LogicalUnitNumber value.

      • getMediaLinkUri

        public URI getMediaLinkUri()
        Required. Specifies the location of the blob in Azure blob store where the media for the disk is located. The blob location must belong to the storage account in the subscription specified by the SubscriptionId value in the operation call. Example: http://example.blob.core.windows.net/disks/mydisk.vhd.
        Returns:
        The MediaLinkUri value.

      • setMediaLinkUri

        public void setMediaLinkUri(URI mediaLinkUriValue)
        Required. Specifies the location of the blob in Azure blob store where the media for the disk is located. The blob location must belong to the storage account in the subscription specified by the SubscriptionId value in the operation call. Example: http://example.blob.core.windows.net/disks/mydisk.vhd.
        Parameters:
        mediaLinkUriValue - The MediaLinkUri value.

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Optional. Specifies the name of the disk. Azure uses the specified disk to create the data disk for the machine and populates this field with the disk name.
        Returns:
        The Name value.

      • setName

        public void setName(String nameValue)
        Optional. Specifies the name of the disk. Azure uses the specified disk to create the data disk for the machine and populates this field with the disk name.
        Parameters:
        nameValue - The Name value.
